languages.text: "Как же далеко это зашло…" {n}По интонациям Паскаля сложно понять, что за эмоцию он испытывает.{/n}
"It has spread that far..." {n}It is difficult to discern Pasqal's emotions from his tone.{/n}

languages.text: “学派的思想传播得这么远啊……”{n}帕斯卡的语气让人无法判断他的情绪。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has spread that far..." {n}It is difficult to discern Pasqal's emotions from his tone.{/n}

languages.text: "Es hat sich so weit ausgebreitet ..." {n}Es ist schwierig, aus Pasqals Ton seine Emotionen herauszuhören.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has spread that far..." {n}It is difficult to discern Pasqal's emotions from his tone.{/n}

languages.text: « Cette doctrine s'est répandue à ce point... » {n}remarque Pasqal sur un ton qui ne vous permet pas de déterminer ce qu'il ressent.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It has spread that far..." {n}It is difficult to discern Pasqal's emotions from his tone.{/n}

languages.text: «Ha llegado tan lejos...». {n}Cuesta discernir el estado emocional de Pasqal por el tono de su voz.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu kadar yayılmış demek ki..." {n}Sesinin tonundan Pasqal'ın ne hissettiğini anlamak oldukça zor.{/n}
